attributes.additional_details: The 2016 referendum result was clear. The people voted to Leave. Parliament must obey to people and deliver what we voted for. Those who detract and refuse to carry out the people’s wishes are in contempt.
attributes.background: We the British People - those who employ all British MPs, demand a General Election in order to authorise our Prime Minister to Leave forthwith, the European Union,  and to then broker fresh new trade arrangements with them.
